NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: nest gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Extracted from the queen of the insect, improved, now it can secrete a hormone that stimulates surrounding friendly creatures, enhancing their combat effectiveness.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: ultrasonic organ
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: An organ located in the mouth that can emit ultrasonic waves, which can be used to detect the surrounding environment and ignore the visual effects of darkness.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: ripping claws
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: A claw made of chitin and hardened bones, replacing the hands, the force contained in it can even tear the enemy in half.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: queen gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: taken from the queen of the underground nest, it can secrete pheromones to call the nearby insect to help you.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: gel gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Obtained the gene that secretes and sprays rapidly solidified colloid from the insect secretion cocoon. This colloid will quickly solidify after touching the target, restricting the target's actions.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: exoskeleton gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Replaced your sweat glands so that it can quickly secrete another liquid to form an exoskeleton outside your body, greatly reducing the damage you take, but reducing your movement speed.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: spike gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: By a large number of insect genes, with the genius idea of the researcher, we restored the ancient legend of a kind of 'hydralisk' related biological genes.
